content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I understand that you come from Saudi-Arabia and I'm curious to know how much you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month.

TERMINATE.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your offer of 800 Euros per month. I'm looking for someone who is willing to pay a higher rent for this apartment. I believe that this apartment is worth more than 800 Euros per month. I suggest that we continue our negotiation to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month.

TERMINATE.

I've already found a better option. Thanks for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer of 1000 Euros per month, Hassan. However, I'm sorry to say that I still cannot accept it. I believe that this apartment is worth more than 1000 Euros per month and I'm looking for someone who is willing to pay a higher rent. I appreciate your interest, but I think we can find a better option for you. Let me know if you have any other offers or if there's anything else I can help you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
